title: Constructivist Approach-Based Integrated Online/Workplace Science Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and experience in office environment tasks
context.additional_context: Design centered on solving real-world scientific problems occurring in learners' workplaces, with enhanced collaboration and online discussions utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science problems related to workplace environments using a constructivist approach and propose solutions
Using online collaboration tools, learners can engage in knowledge construction activities with peers and produce deliverables incorporating feedback

Learners analyze formative assessment results (3 quizzes, 2 practical evaluations), create personalized learning plans, adjust at least two learning strategies within two weeks, and achieve a problem-solving success rate of 80% or higher.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
